AI Description: SignalP 6.0 predicts the presence and location of signal peptide cleavage sites in amino acid sequences from different organisms such as Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria, archae, eukaryotes, and viruses. It contains several algorithms for discriminating signal peptides from transmembrane regions.
Core Features: Predicts Signal Peptide Cleavage Sites In Amino Acid Sequences, Differentiates Signal Peptides From Transmembrane Regions, Available For Various Organisms Including Bacteria, Archae, Eukaryotes, & Viruses
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Protein Analysis, Bioinformatics Tools
